snippet.title: Genesis Alpha One - Roguelike Trailer (PC, Xbox One, PlayStation 4)
snippet.description:
Genesis Alpha One will launch on PC via the Epic Games Store, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One on January 29th 2019.

Genesis Alpha One is a revolutionary mix of roguelike shooter, base building and survival that puts you in the role of an interstellar pioneer.

In a near future ravaged by wars; corrupt regimes and global capitalism left unchecked have resulted in natural resource over-exploitation and pollution devastating the planet. Societies are collapsing. Supported by Earth’s remaining governments, four influential corporations initiate the Genesis program.

As the Captain of a Genesis starship, you journey into uncharted space on the ultimate mission. Build and manage a space vessel, farm resources, deal with terrifying alien infestations, clone creatures and explore a vast, randomly generated universe.

Your goal: Find new homes for humanity’s DNA and save the species from extinction.

Epic Games Store: https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/product/genesis-alpha-one/home
Microsoft Store: https://www.microsoft.com/en-gb/p/genesis-alpha-one/bq3krvcclbvz?activetab=pivot:overviewtab
PlayStation Store: https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/product/EP4064-CUSA10869_00-GENESISALPHA1BN1

https://www.team17.com/games/genesis-alpha-one/
Follow Genesis Alpha One on Twitter: https://twitter.com/GenesisAlphaOne
Like Genesis Alpha One on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GenesisCommand
Follow Team17 on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Team17Ltd
Like Team17 on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Team17/
Chat with us on Discord: http://discord.gg/team17

About Team17 Digital Ltd
Founded in 1990, Team17 Digital Limited is a leading international games label that hosts the Worms franchise, Aven Colony, The Escapists, Genesis Alpha One, Overcooked, Sword Legacy: Omen, Yoku’s Island Express, Yooka-Laylee and many more from developers around the world. Visit www.team17.com for more info. 
bit.ly/SubTeam17
